DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis follow : H1 . Women low-moderate risk APD T1 ( baseline EPDS score 5-9 ) cognitive behavioral intervention ( CBI ) group maintain low-moderate risk status significantly few APD symptom T2 T3 woman low-moderate risk APD ( TAU ) control group ( measure percent participant EPDS score < 9 T2 T3 mean score change ) . H2 : Women high risk APD T1 ( baseline EPDS score â‰¥10 ) CBI group significantly great reduction APD symptom T2 T3 woman high risk APD TAU control group ( measure percent participant EPDS score < 10 T2 T3 mean score change ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Public Health Program Reduce Risk Antepartum Depression
DOC.detailed_description: We collect data use Netbooks computer pre-programmed Qualtrics survey form . At baseline ( T1 ) , post intervention ( T2 ) 1-month follow-up ( T3 ) , participant administer EPDS BDI-II Dolphin MINI neuropsychiatric Interview version 6 . A similar time frame use TAU group . Paired T-tests use determine mean change EPDS score ( primary analysis ) BDI-II score ( secondary analysis ) within CBI TAU group T2 T3 . A T-test measured difference EPDS BDI-II score time period . - The sample size base PI 's pilot intervention study . Using conservative estimate 500 eligible woman site per year 42 % depression risk rate ( moderate high ) , 46 % enrollment rate , possible accrue 97 subject per year risk APD ( moderate high risk ) 193 subject first 24 month study . Using recruitment , retention , eligibility pattern previous study , total study sample 124 subject , 62 IP-CBI group 62 TAU control group , allow 20 % ( 24 ) drop-out rate achieve goal 50 woman IP-CBI 50 woman TAU control group . - We plan determine significant difference EPDS baseline score CBI TAU group full sample CBI TAU group stratify high low-moderate risk antepartum depression .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age older Between 630 week pregnant Enrolled patient local health department ( LHD ) Brody School Medicine Regional Perinatal Center ( BSOMRPC ) Selfidentified African American , Caucasian , Hispanic Able read 4th grade level ; Have score > 4 Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale ( EPDS ) Are willing complete inform consent form Enrolled Medicaid lowincome base Women 's Infant Children ( WIC ) eligibility criterion . Have spontaneous abortion 20 week pregnancy Diagnosed schizophrenia bipolar disorder without psychosis , currently receive treatment depression ; organic mental disorder Diagnosed highrisk pregnancy require bed rest hospitalization Demonstrated active suicidal plan Had concurrent medical condition , hypothyroidism , would explain depression .
